features: MOISTURIZES AND TAMES FRIZZ: Our Effortless Waves conditioner, with Jojoba Oleo Essence, locks in moisture for gorgeous definition and protection against frizz
WITH JOJOBA OLEO ESSENCE: This hair conditioner is made with Jojoba Oleo Essence to moisturize hair for anti-frizz protection
PRO STYLE TECHNOLOGY: Infused with amino acids and ceramide, this salon-level conditioner makes hair 2x stronger and more manageable* with continuous use. *versus a non-conditioning shampoo
TRUSTED INGREDIENTS: This hair conditioner for dry and damaged hair is PETA-certified cruelty-free and is free from Parabens, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin
CURL DEFINITION: Get defined curls with our conditioner for curly hair. Made with Effortless Wave System infused with Jojoba Oil, known to moisturize hair
HAIR CARE TIPS FROM OUR STYLISTS: Use the TRESemmé Effortless Waves Shampoo, followed by this conditioner, to leave hair strong, manageable and healthy-looking
body.description: Get gorgeous defined waves with our frizz-defying TRESemme Effortless Waves shampoo & conditioner collection. This hair conditioner is made with a salon-level formula infused with Jojoba Oleo Essence and locks in moisture for gorgeous definition and protection against frizz. Each TRESemme shampoo and conditioner for hair is made with Pro Style Technology, infused with amino acids and ceramide, for 2x stronger, smoother, easier to manage hair, so you have the perfect foundation to create any style (vs. non-conditioning shampoo). This collection is PETA-certified cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil and DMDM Hydantoin. How to use the Effortless Waves System: Step 1: Apply the TRESemmé Effortless Waves Shampoo to wet hair liberally and gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse. Step 2: Lightly squeeze the TRESemmé Effortless Waves Conditioner from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. Step 3: Finish and style with your favorite TRESemmé products. We've always understood that style is more than a look, it's a powerful tool to help you achieve your dreams. With our professional quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at TRESemmé, from the values we promote-such as not testing on animals and being PETA-approved-to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made to give you professional salon quality haircare products you can trust. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with right wash and care foundation. TRESemmé Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable*. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. *with continued use.

MOISTURIZED, DEFINED WAVES Our Effortless Waves system, with Jojoba Oleo Essence, locks in moisture for gorgeous definition and protection against frizz. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create any style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. PROFESSIONAL, SALON QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemmé is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want.

TRESemmé Effortless Waves Conditioner, 28 oz TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Shampoo,​​​ 28 oz TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Conditioner, 28 oz Main Benefit TRESemmé Effortless Waves Conditioner moisturizes hair and tames frizz. TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Shampoo gently cleanses while replenishing and nourishing hair to leave it feeling hydrated and beautifully soft. TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Conditioner hydrates hair to leave it feeling nourished and beautifully soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and smells amazing
reviews.reviewText: I took a risk ordering this conditioner but oh it was worth it! I have curly/coarse hair and was really just looking for a new conditioner that smells good and would be good to my hair without leaving it a tangled mess. Well I found it here. The tresemme waves conditioner smells so good and leaves my hair so soft and light weight. Now both of my roommates use it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: I'm weird about my conditioner. It has to be thick, and it has to smell good. I love being able to have several in hand so I don't have to keep running to the store.
